testsuite.name: com.bank.testsuite.BankTest
testsuite.system-out:
Click on 'Bank Manager Login' Button
Click on 'Add Customer' Button
Enter First Name Sima to First Name field
Enter Last Name Patel to Last Name field
Enter Postcode HA39PK to Postcode field
Click on 'Add Customer' Button
Get Customer added successfully text : Customer added successfully

Click on 'Bank Manager Login' Button
Click on 'Open Account' Button
Select Customer Just Added 'Harry Potter'
Select Currency 'Pound'
Click on 'Process' Button
Get Account created successfully text : Account created successfully

Click on 'Customer Login' Button
Select name from drop down 'Harry Potter'
Click on 'Login' Button
Find Logout Button : logout
Click on 'Logout' Button
Get Your Name text : Your Name

Click on 'Customer Login' Button
Select name from drop down 'Harry Potter'
Click on 'Login' Button
Click on 'Deposit' Button
Enter Deposit Amount 100 to Deposit Amount field
Click on 'Deposit' Button
Find Deposit Successful Message : Deposit Successful

Click on 'Customer Login' Button
Select name from drop down 'Harry Potter'
Click on 'Login' Button
Click on 'Deposit' Button
Enter Deposit Amount 100 to Deposit Amount field
Click on 'Deposit' Button
Click on 'Withdrawal' Button
Enter Withdrawal Amount 50 to Withdrawal Amount field
Click on 'Withdrawal' Button
Find Withdrawal Successful Message : Transaction successful
